attributes.action: Reverse the decision to Bomb Syria.
attributes.additional_details:
Carrying out air raids within an already populated air space, with other nations carrying out similar air sorties, poses an inexcusable higher risk of danger to life for our RAF personel.
Furthermore, the decisions to bomb Syria will in fact strengthen the resolve of Daesh, and will lead to a further risk of terrorist atrocities being carried out on UK citizens, due to increased anger and resentment of the U.K. Governments decision.
attributes.background: In light of the recent Governemnt decision to start air raids within Syria, this petition is to show the Governement that the people of this great nation DO NOT agree with the decision of the House of Commons.
